text: Rufoclanis is a genus of moths. It is in family Sphingidae. The genus was made by Robert Herbert Carcasson in 1968. == Species == * Rufoclanis erlangeri (Rothschild & Jordan, 1903) * Rufoclanis fulgurans (Rothschild & Jordan, 1903) * Rufoclanis jansei (Vari, 1964) * Rufoclanis maccleeryi Carcasson, 1968 * Rufoclanis numosae (Wallengren, 1860) * Rufoclanis rosea (Druce, 1882) == References == Category:Smerinthini
title: Rufoclanis
